name: War Of Empires
description:
Our game called War of empires is a game made for the strategy genre "GeoJam22".

Controls:

Clicking on white objects opens the construction panel


With the 1 key, you can put the soldiers on the map. The price of each soldier is $ 5

Assets used:
https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/toony-tiny-rts-set
https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/stylized-pbr-nature-pack

Credits:
Ui designer : Samet Efe Bıçak

Game Developer : Yusuf Can Belli

Game Designer : Alperen Çan

Systems that we can't add :

Castle strengthening

Strengthening the tower

Artificial intelligence that will attack our soldiers
